title: LLVM 7 hidden cuda dependency breaks builds
body:
LLVM 7 will search for CUDA on the system path. When using a more recent compiler than GCC 5, the build will fail. This prevents the use of recent GCCs to build LLVM when a system-installation of CUDA is present.

```
spack install llvm@7.0.0%gcc@6.3.0+all_targets build_type=Release +clang+compiler-rt+gold+internal_unwind+libcxx~link_dylib+lld+lldb+polly~python~shared_libs
...
     3028    In file included from /usr/local/cuda/include/cuda_runtime.h:78:0,
     3029                     from <command-line>:0:
  >> 3030    /usr/local/cuda/include/host_config.h:119:2: error: #error -- unsu
             pported GNU version! gcc versions later than 5 are not supported!
     3031     #error -- unsupported GNU version! gcc versions later than 5 are
             not supported!
```

A CMakeList.txt from a successful build shows numerous CUDA libraries are picked up by the build system.

``` bash
$ grep -i cuda `spack location -i llvm@7.0.0 %gcc@5.4.0`/.spack/archived-files/spack-build/CMakeCache.txt | grep so\$
CUDA_CUDART_LIBRARY:FILEPATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so
CUDA_CUDA_LIBRARY:FILEPATH=/usr/lib64/libcuda.so
CUDA_cublas_LIBRARY:FILEPATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcublas.so
CUDA_cufft_LIBRARY:FILEPATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcufft.so
CUDA_cupti_LIBRARY:FILEPATH=/usr/local/cuda/extras/CUPTI/lib64/libcupti.so
CUDA_curand_LIBRARY:FILEPATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcurand.so
CUDA_cusolver_LIBRARY:FILEPATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcusolver.so
CUDA_cusparse_LIBRARY:FILEPATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcusparse.so
CUDA_nppc_LIBRARY:FILEPATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnppc.so
CUDA_nppi_LIBRARY:FILEPATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnppi.so
CUDA_npps_LIBRARY:FILEPATH=/usr/local/cuda/lib64/libnpps.so
CUDA_rt_LIBRARY:FILEPATH=/usr/lib64/librt.so
LIBOMPTARGET_DEP_CUDA_DRIVER_LIBRARIES:FILEPATH=/usr/lib64/libcuda.so
```
